intro: Euphrasia nuristanica, commonly known as the Nuristan eyebright, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Afghanistan and northern Pakistan. It belongs to the Scrophulariaceae family and is characterized by its delicate, yellowish-green flowers that bloom in early spring. The plant typically grows in rocky and alpine environments, thriving at high altitudes. Its leaves are opposite and covered in fine hairs, while its stems are slender and branched. Euphrasia nuristanica is valued for its medicinal properties and is often used in traditional herbal remedies.
